description:
My place is close to 
1 min walk to Key-food(grocery shop)
7 min walk to Barclay center
7 min walk to Subway : B,D,R,N,W,Q,4,5,2,3
7 min walk to Target
Prospect park 
There are lots of free street parking available 

. You’ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, and the views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Studio in Park slope- Brooklyn
review: Very nice and cosy place, if you feel confortable to stay in an apartment occupied the rest of the time by the "owner".
